name: Panthem Rangers
description:
Use your split cards to power up your monsters and attack the enemies.

Rules

Monster Selection

Pick 3 monsters in the beginning of the game. More monster types will unlock as you progress through the game. Each monster has different types, weakness and starting attack cards. After each competed round new attack cards can be added to the deck.

How to Win

To win a round deal enough damage to K.O. each of your opponent's monsters and have at least one monster standing.

Active Monster and Back Monsters

One monster stands in the front and deals and takes damage from the opponent's active monster. The other monsters stay in the back and power up.

Weakness

Attacks deal 2x damage if it has an element a monster is weak against.

Tokens

Tokens stay in play and are triggered by different conditions. Some have energy costs while others are actived at the end of the turn.

Energy

Drag an energy to attach and power up your monster.  Energies are used to activate attacks and recharge at the end of the turn. Attacks with star energies are activated by any energy type. One energy can be attached to a monster each turn.

Regroup

Discard all your cards and draw 5 new.  Can be used up to 3 times per match.
